description: This file defines a route layout component for a Qwik-based web application, including request handling with cache control, a server-side data loader for the current time, and a JSX component rendering header, footer, and slot content.

methods.name: onGet
methods.description: Handles GET requests for the route, setting cache control headers to optimize performance.

methods.name: useServerTimeLoader
methods.description: Loads the current server time as route data.

methods.name: default
methods.description: The default exported component rendering the layout with header, footer, and slot content.
